import React, { useState } from 'react' import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' function NavBar(props) { const [menuOpen, setMenuOpen] = useState(false) function toggleMenu() { setMenuOpen(!menuOpen); if (menuOpen) { setMenuOpen(false); } } return (
